description: Zebras are strikingly beautiful animals known for their black and white stripes.
name: Zebra

description: The tiger is a powerful predator with striking orange fur and black stripes.
name: Tiger

description: Tapirs are large herbivorous mammals with a unique elongated snout and excellent swimmers.
name: Tapir
place_of_found: Central and South America, Southeast Asia

description: The Spectacled Bear is a South American bear species known for its distinctive facial markings.
name: Spectacled Bear

description: Snow leopards are elusive and beautiful big cats known for their ability to thrive in cold, mountainous terrains.
habitat: Mountainous regions of Central and South Asia
name: Snow Leopard

description: Sloths are slow-moving arboreal mammals known for their laziness and long claws.
name: Sloth

description: Servals are slender and medium-sized wild cats known for their exceptional jumping and hunting abilities.
name: Serval

description: The Red-eyed Tree Frog is a colorful tree-dwelling frog known for its striking red eyes.
name: Red-eyed Tree Frog

description: Red pandas are small arboreal mammals known for their distinctive reddish fur and bushy tails.
name: Red Panda

description: Red foxes are clever and adaptable mammals known for their reddish-orange fur and bushy tails.
name: Red Fox

description: Quokkas are small marsupials known for their adorable smiling faces and friendly nature.
name: Quokka

description: Pumas, also known as mountain lions or cougars, are powerful wild cats with a wide distribution in the Americas.
habitat: Various habitats including forests, mountains, and grasslands
name: Puma

description: Polar bears are large carnivorous mammals adapted to life in the Arctic and primarily feed on seals.
name: Polar Bear

description: Platypuses are unique egg-laying mammals with a duck-like bill and webbed feet.
name: Platypus

description: Pangolins are unique mammals covered in protective scales and are often referred to as 'scaly anteaters'.
name: Pangolin

description: Pandas are bears known for their distinctive black and white markings and love for bamboo.
name: Panda

description: Orangutans are great apes known for their intelligence and distinctive reddish-brown fur.
name: Orangutan

description: Okapis are rare and unique mammals known for their zebra-like stripes and long necks.
habitat: Rainforests of the Democratic Republic of the Congo
name: Okapi

description: Mongooses are small carnivores known for their agility and ability to take on venomous snakes.
name: Mongoose

description: Mandrills are colorful and social primates known for their distinct facial markings.
name: Mandrill

description: Manatees, also known as sea cows, are gentle herbivores known for their slow movements and docile behavior.
habitat: Shallow, slow-moving rivers, estuaries, and coastal waters
name: Manatee
place_of_found: North America, Central America, South America, West Africa, and the Caribbean

description: The lion is a large and powerful wild cat known for its majestic appearance and social behavior.
name: Lion

description: Leopard seals are large and formidable predators known for their striking spotted coat and their skill in hunting.
habitat: Antarctic coastal waters and ice packs
name: Leopard Seal

description: Lemurs are primates endemic to Madagascar, known for their diverse species and playful behaviors.
name: Lemur

description: Komodo dragons are the largest lizards and are known for their deadly venomous bite.
name: Komodo Dragon

description: Koalas are arboreal marsupials known for their love of eucalyptus leaves.
name: Koala

description: Kangaroos are marsupials known for their powerful hind legs and pouches.
name: Kangaroo

description: Jaguars are large and powerful wild cats known for their stunning spotted coat and strong jaws.
name: Jaguar

description: Hippopotamuses are large semi-aquatic mammals known for their massive size and aggression.
name: Hippopotamus

description: Gray wolves, also known as timber wolves, are social and highly adaptable predators with a complex pack structure.
habitat: Diverse habitats including forests, tundra, and deserts
name: Gray Wolf

description: Gorillas are large and powerful primates known for their intelligence and social structure.
name: Gorilla

description: Giraffes are the tallest land animals and have long necks and legs.
name: Giraffe

description: Gibbons are small apes known for their agility and loud calls in the treetops.
name: Gibbon

description: Gharials are large crocodiles with long, slender snouts, and they primarily eat fish.
name: Gharial

description: Gazelles are slender and graceful antelopes known for their exceptional speed and agility.
name: Gazelle

description: Fossas are carnivorous mammals endemic to Madagascar, known for their slender and agile bodies.
name: Fossa

description: Fennec foxes are small foxes known for their large ears and adaptability to desert environments.
name: Fennec Fox

description: The elephant is the largest land animal on Earth and is known for its intelligence and long trunk.
name: Elephant

description: Chimpanzees are highly intelligent primates and share about 98% of their DNA with humans.
name: Chimpanzee

description: Cheetahs are the fastest land animals and have slender bodies built for speed.
name: Cheetah

description: Chameleons are unique reptiles known for their ability to change color and their long, sticky tongues.
name: Chameleon

description: Capybaras are the largest rodents in the world and are known for their social and friendly nature.
name: Capybara

description: Capuchin monkeys are intelligent and agile primates known for using tools to obtain food.
name: Capuchin Monkey

description: The blue whale is the largest animal to have ever existed on Earth, known for its massive size and distinct blue-gray coloration.
name: Blue Whale

description: Black Rhinoceroses are large mammals known for their hooked upper lip and solitary behavior.
name: Black Rhinoceros

description: Bisons are large and strong herbivores known for their massive size and iconic hump.
name: Bison

description: Beluga whales, also known as white whales, are known for their distinctive white color and melon-shaped head.
name: Beluga Whale

description: Armadillos are armored mammals known for their protective bony plates and burrowing behavior.
name: Armadillo

description: Arctic wolves are white-furred wolves that inhabit the Arctic regions and are well-adapted to the cold climate.
name: Arctic Wolf

description: Arctic foxes are small foxes adapted to life in cold Arctic regions, known for their thick fur.
name: Arctic Fox
